sentence: Mr Vance's pivot from folksy intellectual to belligerent “patriot” is likely a tactic employed to take on his primary rival, former Ohio State Treasurer Josh Mandel.
author: Graig Graziosi
title: JD Vance mocked for celebrating Marjorie Taylor Greene endorsement as he vows to take US back from ‘scumbags’

sentence: Sources tell The Daily Beast that Trump, a lover of gossip, has “privately regurgitated, often in disgust, a wide range of unverified, often completely unvetted, and lurid rumors about the MAGA candidate.” One source told the publication that Trump “has used the term ‘f*cking weird’ to describe Josh Mandel more than once,” and that he “has talked about [Mandel] and sex in the same sentence more times than I would have liked to hear.” (Reminder, by the way, that Trump has also been credibly accused of sexual misconduct by over two dozen women.)
author: Matt Prigge
title: A MAGA-fied Candidate Is Having Trouble Getting Trump’s Endorsement Due To Rumors Of His ‘F*cking Weird’ Sex Life

sentence: When sentient slime trail Marjorie Taylor Greene, who is somehow a member of Congress, endorsed Senate candidate, author, and asshole JD Vance, we wondered why she’d stiffed Josh Mandel, a seemingly more authentic MAGA zealot.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Trump Pretty Sure Josh Mandel Too Unf*ckable For Endorsement

sentence: The only major Republican candidate in the Ohio Senate race who did not rely on self-financing at all is Josh Mandel, the pro-Trump former Ohio treasurer and Marine Corps veteran.
author: Katherine Huggins
title: Over $560 million in campaign contributions flooded 2022 Senate races in first year of midterm election cycle

sentence: A debate between candidates running for Ohio's open Senate seat descended into chaos on Monday night as Republican Josh Mandel shared a testy exchange with an audience member over his past comments calling Black Lives Matter activists 'thugs.'
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Chaos at Ohio Senate race debate as Republican Josh Mandel shouts at audience member who said he should be 'put out' for calling BLM 'thugs' and calls his Democratic rival 'like AOC only dumber'

sentence: ‘You’re actually dumber than AOC.’ ‘Why are you so angry?’ Donate to my campaign to keep Josh Mandel’s hateful, sexist and racist rhetoric out of the Senate.https://t.co/RxdXFeviiB pic.twitter.com/egt7ImPlpy — Morgan Harper (@mh4oh) February 22, 2022 “Last night I debated Josh Mandel in Cleveland,” she said, “and we saw from him what we’ve come to expect, racism, sexism, xenophobia, this guy has no solutions for the real issues that everyday Ohioans are facing and certainly no solutions for the black community,” throwing down the race card.
author: Chris Donaldson
title: ‘Like AOC only dumber’: Ohio senate debate goes off the rails as racial hate turns to white Marine vet

sentence: Timken’s GOP opponents Josh Mandel, Mike Gibbons and JD Vance have all made a determined effort to win the Trump endorsement, while Matt Dolan is seeking to appeal to moderate Republicans who are less sold on Trump.
title: Trump endorsement casts long shadow over Ohio Senate race

author: Chad Groening/American Family News
title: More Than 100 Pastors Throw Support to Marine Corps Veteran Running for Senate in Ohio

sentence: He doesn’t have the temperament, experience, or fortitude to be a U.S. senator and Ohio voters got a firsthand look at just how unprepared Josh Mandel is to be a leader and that will be reflected at the ballot on May 3.” This is all true, but we also imagine Cotten will twist herself into knots justifying Gibbons’s inevitable endorsement of Mandel if he wins the nomination.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: All Fun And Games Until Ohio GOP Senate Candidate Starts Calling Opponent A 'Pussy'

sentence: Ohio GOP Senate candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons, who made headlines over the weekend after squaring off toe-to-toe during a party debate near Columbus, did not appear ready to back down during interviews on Newsmax Monday.
author: Sandy Fitzgerald
title: Ohio's Mandel, Gibbons to Newsmax: Not Backing Down After Debate Fight
